bug.author: william-r-s
bug.summary: Documentation for tf.contrib.layers.stack replaced by documentation for tf.stack
bug.description: Documentation for tf.contrib.layers.stack appears to be replaced by documentation for tf.stack, see <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/contrib.layers/higher_level_ops_for_building_neural_network_layers_#stack>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/contrib.layers/higher_level_ops_for_building_neural_network_layers_#stack</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/josh11b>@josh11b</denchmark-link> Did you have a docs generator rewrite planned?
This is fixed in the 1.0 docs.
